abstract: In what may be a sign that its investor base is growing restless, Yahoo sent a letter from its chief executive, Jerry Yang, to shareholders Wednesday explaining the Web company’s decision to turn down a takeover offer from Microsoft and laying out its turnaround strategy.
lead_paragraph: In what may be a sign that its investor base is growing restless, Yahoo sent a letter from its chief executive, Jerry Yang, to shareholders Wednesday explaining the Web company’s decision to turn down a takeover offer from Microsoft and laying out its turnaround strategy.

headline.main: Yahoo Makes Its Case to Shareholders
